Author: NightmareXIV
Name: AntiAfkKick [Bees]
Punchline: A Dalamud plugin for preventing being auto-kicked from FFXIV due to inactivity. Install and forget, no config needed.
Description: A Dalamud plugin for preventing being auto-kicked from FFXIV due to inactivity. Install and forget, no config needed.

Author: Taurenkey, NightmareXIV, kawaii
Name: Artisan [Bees]
Punchline: A 'simple' crafting plugin.
Description: The all-in-one crafting plugin. Perfect for people with next to no knowledge about crafting rotations. No need for a library of different macros, the solvers will work dynamically to try and complete your crafts. Also provides convenient ways to craft lists of items or grind out a specific item repeatedly.
Changelog:
- Updated Raphael solver to support new recipes
- Skip Raphael auto-switch for recipes that already have a macro assigned option (by xan)
- Add configurable option to play crafting completed sound on error (by TheOddball)

Author: erdelf, Herculezz
Name: AutoDuty [Bees]
Punchline: AutoDuty
Description: A plugin to run dungeons for you with Trust, Duty Support, Squadrons, Variants, and Regular, Requires BossMod, vnavmesh and a Rotation Plugin (BossMod AutoRotation, Wrath or RotationSolverReborn)
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* unsync requires no ilvl check by @erdelf in https://github.com/erdelf/AutoDuty/pull/12
* Desynth Helper: adjusting item check for gearset protection by @erdelf in https://github.com/erdelf/AutoDuty/pull/13


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/erdelf/AutoDuty/compare/0.0.0.255...0.0.0.256

Author: Det, Taurenkey
Name: AutoHook [Bees]
Punchline: Makes fishing less (or more) boring
Description: It hooks the fish for you, can you believe it?

Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: AutoRetainer [Bees]
Punchline: Collect and assign ventures to your retainers from the comfort of your bed.
Description: Collect and assign ventures to your retainers from the comfort of your bed.

Author: veyn, xan_0
Name: Boss Mod [Bees]
Punchline: Don't fail at raid mechanics anymore
Description: A bunch of utilities to simplify bosses. Currently supports endwalker content.

Author: Minmoose, Asgard and Contributors
Name: Brio [Bees]
Punchline: Enhanced GPosing! A utility for improving the G-Pose experience in FFXIV.
Description:
Brio is suite of tools that gives you advanced control to edit and pose actors during G-Pose.

- Advanced actor posing 
	- While animating
	- Adjust actor positions without them resetting
	- Overlay and graphical posing modes
- Creation of up to 239 G-Pose actors
- Creation of custom lights
- Supports integration with Penumbra, Glamourer & Customize+
- Offline import and export of MCDF files onto G-Pose actors
- Play XAT .xcp camera files
- Play/Blend animations of G-Pose actors
- Control Time/Weather in both the Overworld and G-Pose
- Change the active festivals and apply up to 4 at once
- Add/Remove Status Effects of G-Pose actors

Author: LeonBlade
Name: Burning Down the House [Bees]
Description: Move around housing items with coordinates and allows you to place anywhere.
Punchline: House decorating made easy!

Author: UnknownX
Name: Cammy [Bees]
Punchline: A simple editor for the game's camera settings
Description:
A simple camera editor to change various game defaults such as zoom and fov.
This is a zoom hack, if you aren't comfortable with that fact, don't install it.

Author: Risa and Contributors
Name: Customize+ [Bees]
Description: A plugin that allows you to customize your character beyond FFXIV limitations by directly editing bone parameters.
Punchline: Customize your character beyond FFXIV's limitations.

Author: Drakansoul
Name: DisPlace Plugin [Bees]
Punchline: Automatically save & load furniture layouts in ANY house.
Description: Automatically save & load the positions of house furniture. Copy other housing layouts. Import/export layouts from the MakePlace program.

Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: GatherBuddy Reborn [Bees]
Description: Adds commands to simplify gathering by finding nodes and fish and their locations via item name and a UI to keep track of special uptime and weather conditions. Also automatically gathers items based on these conditions using lists that you specify. Automated gathering requires vnavmesh.
Punchline: Simplify Gathering and Fishing to the extreme.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Fishing/Firmament/Diadem Bug fixes by @Deathbeyond87 in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/pull/430


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/compare/7.3.5.11...7.3.5.12

Author: Ottermandias
Name: Glamourer [Bees]
Punchline: Change and save appearance of players.
Description: Adds functionality to change and store appearance of players, customization and equip. Requires Penumbra to be installed and activated to work. Can also add preview options to the Changed Items tab for Penumbra.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselDebug [Bees]
Description: For developers.
Punchline: Various tools to debug things.
Changelog:
- Added: New unlock tab "Items".
- Added: Type redirect for FishingEventHandler.
- Added: Support to switch to experimental sheets in the "Excel (v2)" tab.
- Added: A Patch column was added to the "Recipes" unlock tab.
- Added: The missing 4 new unknown columns to the "UIColor" tab.
- Added: "Unlock Span Length Test" tab now lists arrays from QuestManager.
- Fixed: "UIColor" inputs are now correctly spanning the whole width of the column.
- Fixed: PlaceNames in the "Territory Intended Use" tab are now correctly using the UI language.
- Updated: The "Territory Intended Use" and "Item Action Type" tabs now load their data asynchronously.
- Updated: ClientStructs now at f2341514 (compare).

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks [Bees]
Description: Keep on tweaking.
Punchline: A collection of quality of life tweaks.
Changelog:
Commands

- Fixed: `/reloadui` wasn't usable when on the Free Trial. (Thanks to @Enriath)

Author: Caraxi
Name: Honorific [Bees]
Punchline: Customized titles for you and yours.
Description: Assign custom titles to players.
Changelog: Fixed displaying titles within the examine window.
TestingChangelog:
Trying something different

Please report:
- **Any cases of nameplates flashing randomly**
- Any cases of the wrong title appearing on players
- Any cases of a custom title appearing on an NPC
- Any cases of other UI behaving unexpectedly
- Any cases of a title getting stuck on a custom title after the plugin is disabled

When reporting any issues please use the `Honorific` channel in `plugin-help-forum` (<#1104305790975758336>)

Author: Taurenkey, NightmareXIV, Gidedin
Name: LazyLoot [Bees]
Punchline: Dungeon Loot but Lazy.
Description:
Roll command with various arguments need | needonly | greed | pass | passall. 
Chat and Toast output and delay for rolling.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Lifestream [Bees]
Punchline: A plugin to speed up Aethernet travel and World changing.
Description:
- One click to teleport to any world or aethernet destination
- Click on aetheryte shards inside zone map to teleport to them
Changelog: - Fixed an issue where, if a character data center traveled to a data center on a different region and then traveled to another world within visited data center without returning home first, plugin would no longer be able to log into that character

Author: Chalkos
Name: Marketbuddy [Bees]
Punchline: Less clicks, more gil!
Description: Helper for your day-to-day market operations.
Changelog:
* update for api13 (thanks PhoenixtheII)
* persist option to open current prices list when holding SHIFT (thanks PhoenixtheII)

Author: kawaii, Glyceri
Name: Moodles [Bees]
Description: Design and apply your own status effects with custom formatting, durations, and other accoutrements.
Punchline: Crippling depression now in the form of a debuff, kupo!

Author: UnknownX
Name: NoClippy [Bees]
Punchline: Reduces the effects of lag on certain aspects of the game, and can show GCD clips
Description: Reduces the effects of lag on certain aspects of the game, such as weaving and statuses. Usable as an alternative, or in addition, to XivAlexander.

Author: Tischel
Name: NOTED [Bees]
Punchline: Duty-specific notes!
Description:
Lets you create notes that are linked to specific duties (they will only show during those duties).
You can also tie notes to certain jobs so they only appear when on the right job.
Changelog: - Added support for Patch 7.3 and Dalamud API 13.

Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: Orbwalker [Bees]
Punchline: S P A C E G L I D I N G
Description: Locks player movement while casting and allows for maximum caster uptime during the course of a fight.
Changelog:
- Improved job selection UI
- Fixed error caused by selecting DoH/DoL in Jobs tab (by Akechi)
- Added Meditate from SAM under Job-specific Actions in Extras tab (by Akechi)
- Added Block All Movement option; supports Controller & KBM (by Akechi)
- UI cleanup (by Akechi)
- Vector mode for overlay, supports vertical layout (by wah)

Author: Taurenkey, NightmareXIV, croizat
Name: Pandora's Box [Bees]
Punchline: Do you dare to open Pandora's Box?
Description:
Pandora's Box is a collection of major QoL tweaks and adjustments.

Open the box with /pandora
Changelog:
- Additional IPCs added for using internal names instead of feature names.
- Config added for Pandora Gathering so that when remember item is enabled and the remembered item is not present, starting buffs will not be used.

Author: Ottermandias, Nylfae, Adam, Wintermute
Name: Penumbra [Bees]
Punchline: Runtime mod loader and manager.
Description: Runtime mod loader and manager.

Author: UnknownX
Name: ReAction [Bees]
Punchline: QoL for the battle system.
Description: Improves aspects of the battle system with action stacks (like MOAction) and various QoL settings.

Author: Taurenkey, NightmareXIV
Name: Saucy [Bees]
Punchline: When working for MGP is too much effort.
Description: Automates certain Gold Saucer mini-games.
Changelog:
- Mini cactpot fixes (by Jaksuhn)
- Triple triad stop command (by  t0mball)

Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Heels [Bees]
Description: Adjust the position of your character model
Punchline: Adjust the position of your character model

Author: Eauldane
Name: Snowcloak Sync [Bees]
Description: This plugin will synchronize your Penumbra mods and current Glamourer state with other paired clients automatically.
Punchline: Come in from the cold and show us your true self.

Author: veyn, croizat
Name: V(ery) Island [Bees]
Punchline: Automate island sanctuary activities
Description: Automate gathering, workshop assignments, etc.

Author: SheepGoMeh
Name: Visibility [Bees]
Punchline: Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.
Description:
Allows you to hide players, pets, chocobos and minions.
Includes VoidList, which is a better blacklist.
Accessible via /pvis
More information available via /xlhelp
Changelog:
- API 13 update
- Added an option to only hide players when in combat
TestingChangelog:
Implemented a proximity setting which lets you hide entities based on their proximity to you and the threshold (how many entities are within the proximity radius)

Please report any issues via feedback/Discord/GitHub Issues

Author: veyn, xan_0
Name: vnavmesh [Bees]
Punchline: Move around!
Description: Utility to automatically move the character around in the world, skilfully avoiding any obstacles.

Author: Team Wrath
Name: Wrath Combo [Bees]
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.
Description: Turns one action into many! Similar to how PvP actions work, we take an action and build a whole combo out of it. Sometimes it's as simple as a 1-2-3 combo, other times it's a full job rotation. Either way, you'll find something suited for your rotation needs.
Changelog: Please check the project's GitHub or Discord for a full changelog.

Author: keifufu
Name: XivVoices [Bees]
Punchline: Turning every dialogue into a voiced dialogue!
Description: A plugin that enhances your gaming experience by adding voice to every NPC dialogue, battle interaction, and more. /xivv

Author: daemitus, kawaii
Name: Yes Already [Bees]
Punchline: Clicks Yes in various dialogs you've specified.
Description: Tired of clicking yes in Praetorium? Can't stand using keys in dungeons? Well do I have the plugin for you! Yes Already is specifically designed to click all the annoying dialogs you've grown accustomed facerolling. Just enter the dialog text, and you'll never see it again! Also works with /regex/ and has several built-in modules for dialogs that aren't quite yes/no prompts but act like it (like desynth).
